heading: Today
text: Morning snow or rain showers north, south through the mountains, tapering off. Increasing sun late morning and afternoon in NY and south of Rt. 2. Windy and colder. Highs in the 30s to low 40s north, in the 40s south. Winds northwest 10 to 25 mph, gusting 35 to 45 mph, decreasing in the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Some evening clouds northeast, otherwise becoming clear. Lows in the 20s, cold spots dropping to 20 degrees. Winds northwest 10 to 15 mph, diminishing to light.

heading: Friday
text: Any morning sun giving way to more clouds. A passing snow or rain shower north in the morning, then a rising chance of afternoon rain showers north. Highs in the 40s north to around 50 south. Light winds, becoming southwest near 10 mph east of the Green Mountains, and 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west.
